result.eng: I am worried about the baby's health.
result.ga: Tá mé buartha faoi shláinte an linbh
result.orig: Tá mé buartha faoi shláinte an linbh
result.html: Tá mé buartha faoi shláinte an linbhI am worried about the baby's health.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé buarṫa faoi ẛláinte an linḃI am worried about the baby's health.

result.eng: She abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.
result.ga: Thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn
result.orig: Thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn
result.html: Thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in ÉirinnShe abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Ṫréig sí a tír ḋúċais ar son poist mar ḟeiġlí linḃ le teaġlaċ in ÉirinnShe abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.

result.eng: You can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.
result.ga: Tá Babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbh
result.orig: Tá Babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbh
result.html: Tá Babaí inleithscéil go fóill nó níl inti ach luspairt linbhYou can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.
result.ponchtml: Tá Babaí inleiṫscéil go fóill nó níl inti aċ luspairt linḃYou can excuse Babaí, she is only a soft young thing of a child.
